original_text: I have never refused to help people who are poor. I have always helped widows to hope for good things. I have never refused to help people who are poor.
korean_text: 내가 언제 가난한 자의 소원을 막았거나 과부의 눈으로 하여금 실망하게 하였던가

sentences.original_text: I have never refused to help people who are poor
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 가난한 사람들을 돕는 것을 거절한 적이 없습니다

sentences.original_text: I have always helped widows to hope for good things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 과부들이 좋은 것을 바라도록 도왔습니다

sentences.original_text: I have never refused to help people who are poor
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 가난한 사람들을 돕는 것을 거절한 적이 없습니다
